title: Steve McQueen | The St. Louis Bank Robbery 1959 (Crime, Thriller) Colorized Full Movie

sources.title: Steve McQueen | The St. Louis Bank Robbery 1959 (Crime, Thriller) Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
Planned like clockwork...it goes off like a time bomb!
A gang of career criminals and a young local, plan and rehearse a bank robbery in Missouri. Complications arise when the sister of one of the gang starts voicing suspicions, and their trust is tested as the fateful day nears.

Original title: The St. Louis Bank Robbery (1959)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/Z8K_ZjkGPKk


This film is available with subtitles in many languages
Directors: Charles Guggenheim, John Stix
Writer: Richard T. Heffron 
Stars: Steve McQueen, Crahan Denton, David Clarke
Genres: Crime,  Drama, Thriller

00:00 Full Movie
07:30 Criminal reunion leads to a plea for help from an ex-lover, followed by tension and reminiscing in a bar.
23:35 Bank robbery planning and discussion of a past encounter lead to tension and suspicion among the characters.
33:54 Bank robbery planning and preparation with potential complications.
40:24 Bank robbery plan discussed, George's struggle, and a warning to Ann.
48:43 Bank robbery plan goes awry as unexpected events unfold, leading to suspicion and tension among the group.
57:00 Bank robbery plot unfolds with George, Ann, and Gino involved, leading to a tense confrontation and escape attempt.
1:06:45 Shootout with the police and the betrayal of one of the robbers.
1:18:31 Hostage situation and tragic outcome.
